title: Cordless Automatic Hair Curler,Automatic Curling Iron with LCD Display and 4 Adjustable Temperature,Portable USB Rechargeable Anti-Tangle Hair Curler,Fast Heating for Hair Styling
features: ❤One-Click automatic curling iron: All you need to do is press and hold the Left/Right button until the beeps are over, , and you will get long-lasting and natural perfect curls.

❤Anti-tangle design: Using smart sensor chip design, if the automatic curling iron curls too much hair or does not work correctly, the curling iron will automatically stop working to avoid the problem of stuck hair, and it is safer to use.

❤Anti-scalding & Ionic Ceramic Technology: Cordless Automatic Hair Curler contains nano silver, ceramic coating and tourmaline, which can protect the hair from static electricity and heat. At the same time, making the hair smoother, brighter and healthier.

❤High-capacity Battery: Built-in 4800mAh lithium battery, USB (Type C) 5V/2A charge cable included, 3-4 Hours fully charged time can work for up to 40 minutes. with Automatic Shutdown Function, Save Power and Ensure Application Safety.

❤4 Temperature & 6 Timing Settings: Considering different hair textures and styles, rotating curling iron equips with 300℉ to 390℉, suitable for all hair types. waves hair curler worked wonders even for heat damaged or coarse hair. with a timing of 8-18s, can form softer waves or more defined curls.
